#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
 #define gc getchar_unlocked
unsigned long long read_int() {
  char c = gc();
  while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
  int ret = 0;
  while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
    ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
    c = gc();
  }
  return ret;
}
typedef long long int uint64;
uint64 PowMod(uint64 x, uint64 e, uint64 mod)
{
uint64 res;
 
if (e == 0)
{
res = 1;
}
else if (e == 1)
{
res = x;
}
else
{
res = PowMod(x, e / 2, mod);
res = res * res % mod;
if (e % 2)
res = res * x % mod;
}
 
return res;
}
int main(void) 
{
    uint64 t,n;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		printf("%lld\n",PowMod(2,n,1000000007));
	}
	return 0;
}
